titleInfo.title: Skyway Drive-in Theaters... Where the Boys Are

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black on orange) Hatch poster showing the Skyway Drivein film Schedule for April 9-12. Presentations include 1960 film "Where the Boys Are" starring Connie Stevens and George Hamilton, 1960 film "Girl of the Night" starring Anne Francis and Lloyd Nolan, 1953 film "Hondo"starring John Wayne and 1955 film "Mr. Roberts"starring Henry Fonda.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
